law.catch_line: Administrative regulations relating to short-term nursing home insurance policies.
law.text: The commissioner shall promulgate administrative regulations that include standards for full and fair disclosure setting forth the manner, content, and required disclosures for sale of short-term nursing home insurance policies, terms of renewability, initial and subsequent conditions or eligibility, nonduplication of coverage provisions, coverage of dependents, pre-existing conditions, termination of insurance, continuation of conversion, probationary periods, limitations, exceptions, reductions, elimination periods, requirements for replacement, recurrent conditions, and definitions.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1172, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 304, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2002.
